original_title: UFOTV Présents: Journey To The Hollow Earth - The History, Mythology & Folklore That The Earth Has A Hollow Realm
overview: The Hollow Earth Theory is represented in the history of many diverse cultures throughout the world. Avalon of Camelot, Garden of Eden, Paradise Lost, Shangri-La, and Valhalla are names assigned to a mystical and physical place thought by some to house prehistoric animals and plants. This program is a compilation of extensive research into the history of man’s attempt to solve this riddle.
title: UFOTV Présents: Journey To The Hollow Earth - The History, Mythology & Folklore That The Earth Has A Hollow Realm
